H0.text: What traditional sport was banned in Britain in 2004. Cockfighting

H1.text: What traditional sport was banned in Britain in 2004. Bullfighting

H2.text: What traditional sport was banned in Britain in 2004. Badger Baiting

H3.text: What traditional sport was banned in Britain in 2004. Foxhunt

A4.text: Fox hunting is prohibited in Great Britain by the Hunting Act 2004 (England and Wales).

A5.text: A law banning the activity in England and Wales came into force in February 2005.
